data.quote: Be clearly aware of the stars and infinity on high. Then life seems almost enchanted after all
data.author: Vincent Van Gogh

data.quote: Life begins where fear ends.
data.author: Osho

data.quote: Creativity is the greatest rebellion in existence.
data.author: Osho

data.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart
data.author: Conficus

data.quote: Do not sit and wait. Get out there, feel life. Touch the sun, and immerse in the sea.
data.author: Hafiz

data.quote: Conquer the devils with a little thing called love
data.author: Bob Marley

data.quote: Learn this from water: loud splashes the brook but the oceans depth are calm.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: None but ourselves can free our minds.
data.author: Bob Marley

data.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Don’t worry what others are doing. Do you!
data.author: Russell Simmons

data.quote: Don’t worry what others are doing. Do you!
data.author: Russell Simmons

data.quote: See the world as it is, not as you wish it would be.
data.author: E. Lockhart

data.quote: Life’s too mysterious to take too serious.
data.author: Mary Engelbreit

data.quote: Don’t sweat the petty things and don’t pet the sweaty things.
data.author: George Carlin

data.quote: A heart without dreams is like a bird without feathers.
data.author: Suzy Kassem

data.quote: “Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: If it isn’t a little scary it probably isn’t worth your time.
data.author: Ted Murphy

data.quote: What the mind can conceive, it can achieve.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
data.author: Aristotle
